mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, FLOOR(SYSDATE - TO_DATE(CREATE_DATE)) AS PASS_DAY FROM BOARD ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE) VALUES (BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
